column5: I'm thinking about picking one up...  Does anyone have one?  Pros/Cons?

How about I sell you my Brand new Minn Kota Endura 30lbs thrust sealed in the box for $110 instead.  I have never heard anyone with problems with these particular trolling motors.  As far as the BPS models well my guess is as good as yours.  Let me know!
Good Deal, i wonder who makes prowler Motorguide?
